description: Configuration schema for Sanoid.net's Sanoid.json configuration file

$id.description: The name of the config file. Sanoid expects to see 'Sanoid.json'.

CacheDirectory.description: The cache directory sanoid will use

ZfsPath.description: The path to the zfs utility

ZpoolPath.description: The path to the zpool utility

DryRun.description: If Sanoid.net will perform a dry run and make no changes to ZFS.

TakeSnapshots.description: If running Sanoid.net will take snapshots by default

PruneSnapshots.description: If running Sanoid.net will prune expired snapshots by default

Templates.description: Templates to apply to dataset nodes

Formatting.description: Configuration section for configurable formatting options for output, naming, etc.

ComponentSeparator.description: The string used for separating the prefix, timestamp, and suffix components of a snapshot name. Can be an empty string.

Prefix.description: The prefix component of all snapshot names.

TimestampFormatString.description: .net-style DateTimeOffset format string for the timestamp component of snapshot names.
TimestampFormatString.$comment: See the Microsoft documentation for DateTimeOffset.ToString() format strings. Note that backslash must be escaped for JSON and that the resulting string must be properly escaped for the ToString function.

FrequentSuffix.description: The suffix component of frequent snapshot names.

HourlySuffix.description: The suffix component of hourly snapshot names.

DailySuffix.description: The suffix component of daily snapshot names.

WeeklySuffix.description: The suffix component of weekly snapshot names.

MonthlySuffix.description: The suffix component of monthly snapshot names.

YearlySuffix.description: The suffix component of yearly snapshot names.

Monitoring.description: Configuration section for configurable formatting options for monitoring.
